description: EVP/ITC Specialists/Paranormal Investigators Mark and Debby Constantino join Darkness Radio to talk about their experience using recording devices to capture the disembodied voices of the dead during paranormal investigations! We also play some samples of those Electronic Voice Phenomena!Â
